code:
flowchart TB
    %% Main Components
    subgraph "Frontend"
        UI["User Interface"]
        SemanticSearch["Semantic Search Button"]
        ImageSearch["Image Search Button"]
        ProductCard["Product Card Component"]
        ProductGrid["Product Grid"]
    end
    
    subgraph "Backend"
        API["FastAPI Server"]
        Routes["API Routes"]
        Models["Data Models"]
        QueryBuilder["Query Builder"]
        ResultProcessor["Result Processor"]
    end
    
    subgraph "Azure Cloud"
        subgraph "Azure SQL Database"
            SQLdb[(Product Database)]
            ChangeTracking["Change Tracking"]
        end
        
        subgraph "Azure Function"
            SQLTrigger["SQL Trigger Function"]
            EmbeddingGenerator["Embedding Generator"]
            TextVectorCreator["Text Vector Creator"]
            ImageVectorCreator["Image Vector Creator"]
            RedisUpdater["Redis Updater"]
        end
        
        subgraph "Azure Cache for Redis"
            RedisCache[(Redis Cache)]
            VectorIndex["HNSW Vector Index"]
            ProductMetadata["Product Metadata"]
        end
    end
    
    subgraph "Initial Load"
        JupyterNb["Jupyter Notebook"]
        SentenceTransformer["Sentence Transformer"]
        Img2Vec["Img2Vec ResNet-18"]
        VectorFiles["Vector JSON Files"]
    end
    
    %% Connections
    UI --> ProductGrid
    ProductGrid --> ProductCard
    ProductCard --> SemanticSearch
    ProductCard --> ImageSearch
    
    SemanticSearch -- "API Call" --> Routes
    ImageSearch -- "API Call" --> Routes
    
    Routes --> QueryBuilder
    QueryBuilder --> VectorIndex
    VectorIndex -- "Search Results" --> ResultProcessor
    ResultProcessor --> ProductMetadata
    ResultProcessor -- "Similar Products" --> UI
    
    %% Initial Data Loading Flow
    JupyterNb -- "Extract Data" --> SQLdb
    JupyterNb -- "Process Text" --> SentenceTransformer
    JupyterNb -- "Process Images" --> Img2Vec
    SentenceTransformer -- "768-dim vectors" --> VectorFiles
    Img2Vec -- "512-dim vectors" --> VectorFiles
    VectorFiles -- "Load" --> RedisCache
    
    %% Prefetch Caching Flow
    SQLdb -- "Product Update" --> ChangeTracking
    ChangeTracking -- "Trigger" --> SQLTrigger
    SQLTrigger -- "Get Changed Products" --> EmbeddingGenerator
    EmbeddingGenerator -- "Process Text" --> TextVectorCreator
    EmbeddingGenerator -- "Process Images" --> ImageVectorCreator
    TextVectorCreator -- "New Text Vectors" --> RedisUpdater
    ImageVectorCreator -- "New Image Vectors" --> RedisUpdater
    RedisUpdater -- "Update Vectors" --> RedisCache
    RedisUpdater -- "Update Metadata" --> ProductMetadata
    
    %% Search Flow Process
    subgraph "Semantic Search Flow"
        S1["User clicks 'By Text' button"]
        S2["Frontend calls API with product_id"]
        S3["Backend retrieves product's text vector"]
        S4["Query Builder creates HNSW search with filters"]
        S5["Redis executes vector similarity search"]
        S6["Backend processes results"]
        S7["Frontend displays similar products"]
        
        S1 --> S2 --> S3 --> S4 --> S5 --> S6 --> S7
    end
    
    subgraph "Image Search Flow"
        I1["User clicks 'By Image' button"]
        I2["Frontend calls API with product_id"]
        I3["Backend retrieves product's image vector"]
        I4["Query Builder creates HNSW search with filters"]
        I5["Redis executes vector similarity search"]
        I6["Backend processes results"]
        I7["Frontend displays similar products"]
        
        I1 --> I2 --> I3 --> I4 --> I5 --> I6 --> I7
    end
    
    subgraph "Prefetch Caching Process"
        P1["Admin updates product in SQL Database"]
        P2["SQL Change Tracking detects update"]
        P3["Azure Function triggered with changed data"]
        P4["Function extracts product information"]
        P5["Function generates new text embedding"]
        P6["Function generates new image embedding"]
        P7["Function combines embeddings"]
        P8["Function updates Redis vector data"]
        P9["Function updates Redis product metadata"]
        P10["Vector index automatically updated"]
        
        P1 --> P2 --> P3 --> P4 --> P5 & P6
        P5 & P6 --> P7 --> P8 --> P9 --> P10
    end
    
    subgraph "HNSW Indexing Process"
        H1["Define image vector field (512-dim)"]
        H2["Define text vector field (768-dim)"]
        H3["Add tag fields (gender, category)"]
        H4["Create index with COSINE distance metric"]
        H5["Apply index to product_vector: keys"]
        
        H1 & H2 --> H3 --> H4 --> H5
    end
    
    %% Styling
    classDef azure fill:#0072C6,color:white,stroke:#0072C6,stroke-width:2px
    classDef redis fill:#DC382D,color:white,stroke:#DC382D,stroke-width:2px
    classDef react fill:#61DAFB,color:black,stroke:#61DAFB,stroke-width:2px
    classDef python fill:#3776AB,color:white,stroke:#3776AB,stroke-width:2px
    classDef process fill:#FFF,color:black,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px,stroke-dasharray: 5 5
    
    class SQLdb,ChangeTracking,SQLTrigger,EmbeddingGenerator,TextVectorCreator,ImageVectorCreator,RedisUpdater azure
    class RedisCache,VectorIndex,ProductMetadata redis
    class UI,SemanticSearch,ImageSearch,ProductCard,ProductGrid react
    class API,Routes,Models,QueryBuilder,ResultProcessor,JupyterNb,SentenceTransformer,Img2Vec python
    class S1,S2,S3,S4,S5,S6,S7,I1,I2,I3,I4,I5,I6,I7,P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,P8,P9,P10,H1,H2,H3,H4,H5 process
